title: Mobile-Assisted Language Learning (MALL) Course for Vocational English Education

context.additional_context: An asynchronous learning environment optimized for smartphone-based mobile learning, strengthening job-related English expressions and communication skills for job seekers.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize over 500 job-specific technical terms in contextually appropriate ways.
Learners can reduce grammatical errors to below 5% when writing emails/reports required in professional environments.
Learners can deliver a logical 3+ minute presentation and engage in Q&A in English during simulated job interviews.
Learners can independently sustain self-directed learning activities for at least 5 hours per week via a mobile LMS.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
